text: Ni shuo:“Zai wo suo shou de qishi li, wo buneng faxian renhe ren suo bude chi de shiwu; chufei shi zi si wu, huo liuchu de xieye, huo zhurou——yinwei tamen que shi bu jie de——huo shi song fei an la zhi ming er zai de fanzui wu.” Fan wei shi suo po, fei chu ziyuan, qie buguo fen de ren,(sui chi jinwu, hao wu zuiguo) yinwei ni de zhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
